This tutorial will help you get familiar with the world of MMORPG
and introduce you to the basics of the game.
steps.chat: Start with an exciting tutorial and complete your first quest. Ready for the adventure?

Pay attention to what I will write to you.

Now, let's explore the classics of MMORPG.

Your inventory stores all the items you've collected.
You can equip, unequip, or discard items.
Some items can be used by clicking in the voting menu.

steps.chat: These are plantations, which are part of agriculture. Collect one plant!
Hit the hearts with the hammer, and you'll see the plant collection process.
Take them to the house and process them by clicking the appropriate buttons in the voting menu. Click on 'Craft'.

To do this, open the voting list in the special zone from the menu and select the required item.
